has_pushouts_of_has_binary_coproducts_of:
/-- If a category has all binary coproducts and all coequalizers, then it also has all pushouts.
    As usual, this is not an instance, since there may be a more direct way to construct
    pushouts. -/
theorem has_pushouts_of_has_binary_coproducts_of_has_coequalizers (C : Type u) [𝒞 : Category.{v} C]
    [has_binary_coproducts C] [has_coequalizers C] : has_pushouts C :=
  has_pushouts_of_has_colimit_span C
#align
  has_pushouts_of_has_binary_coproducts_of_has_coequalizers has_pushouts_of_has_binary_coproducts_of_has_coequalizers
has_pullbacks_of_has_binary_products_of_:
/-- If a category has all binary products and all equalizers, then it also has all pullbacks.
    As usual, this is not an instance, since there may be a more direct way to construct
    pullbacks. -/
theorem has_pullbacks_of_has_binary_products_of_has_equalizers (C : Type u) [𝒞 : Category.{v} C] [has_binary_products C]
    [has_equalizers C] : has_pullbacks C :=
  { has_limit := fun F => has_limit_of_iso (diagram_iso_cospan F).symm }
#align has_pullbacks_of_has_binary_products_of_has_equalizers has_pullbacks_of_has_binary_products_of_has_equalizers
has_limit_cospan_of_has_limit_pair_of_ha:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⨯ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⨯ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/

/-- If the product `X ⨯ Y` and the equalizer of `π₁ ≫ f` and `π₂ ≫ g` exist, then the
    pullback of `f` and `g` exists: It is given by composing the equalizer with the projections. -/
theorem has_limit_cospan_of_has_limit_pair_of_has_limit_parallel_pair {C : Type u} [𝒞 : Category.{v} C] {X Y Z : C}
    (f : «expr ⟶ » X Z) (g : «expr ⟶ » Y Z) [has_limit (pair X Y)]
    [has_limit (parallel_pair («expr ≫ » prod.fst f) («expr ≫ » prod.snd g))] : has_limit (cospan f g) :=
  let π₁ : «expr ⟶ » («expr ⨯ » X Y) X := prod.fst
  let π₂ : «expr ⟶ » («expr ⨯ » X Y) Y := prod.snd
  let e := equalizer.ι («expr ≫ » π₁ f) («expr ≫ » π₂ g)
  has_limit.mk
    { cone := pullback_cone.mk («expr ≫ » e π₁) («expr ≫ » e π₂) <| by simp only [category.assoc, equalizer.condition]
      is_limit :=
        pullback_cone.is_limit.mk _
          (fun s =>
            equalizer.lift (prod.lift (s.π.app walking_cospan.left) (s.π.app walking_cospan.right)) <| by
              rw [← category.assoc, limit.lift_π, ← category.assoc, limit.lift_π] <;> exact pullback_cone.condition _)
          (by simp) (by simp) fun s m h₁ h₂ => by
          ext
          · simpa using h₁
          · simpa using h₂ }
#align
  has_limit_cospan_of_has_limit_pair_of_has_limit_parallel_pair has_limit_cospan_of_has_limit_pair_of_has_limit_parallel_pair
has_colimit_span_of_has_colimit_pair_of_:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⨿ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⨿ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- If the coproduct `Y ⨿ Z` and the coequalizer of `f ≫ ι₁` and `g ≫ ι₂` exist, then the
    pushout of `f` and `g` exists: It is given by composing the inclusions with the coequalizer. -/
theorem has_colimit_span_of_has_colimit_pair_of_has_colimit_parallel_pair {C : Type u} [𝒞 : Category.{v} C] {X Y Z : C}
    (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) (g : «expr ⟶ » X Z) [has_colimit (pair Y Z)]
    [has_colimit (parallel_pair («expr ≫ » f coprod.inl) («expr ≫ » g coprod.inr))] : has_colimit (span f g) :=
  let ι₁ : «expr ⟶ » Y («expr ⨿ » Y Z) := coprod.inl
  let ι₂ : «expr ⟶ » Z («expr ⨿ » Y Z) := coprod.inr
  let c := coequalizer.π («expr ≫ » f ι₁) («expr ≫ » g ι₂)
  has_colimit.mk
    { cocone :=
        pushout_cocone.mk («expr ≫ » ι₁ c) («expr ≫ » ι₂ c) <| by
          rw [← category.assoc, ← category.assoc, coequalizer.condition]
      is_colimit :=
        pushout_cocone.is_colimit.mk _
          (fun s =>
            coequalizer.desc (coprod.desc (s.ι.app walking_span.left) (s.ι.app walking_span.right)) <| by
              rw [category.assoc, colimit.ι_desc, category.assoc, colimit.ι_desc] <;> exact pushout_cocone.condition _)
          (by simp) (by simp) fun s m h₁ h₂ => by
          ext
          · simpa using h₁
          · simpa using h₂ }
#align
  has_colimit_span_of_has_colimit_pair_of_has_colimit_parallel_pair has_colimit_span_of_has_colimit_pair_of_has_colimit_parallel_pair
